iEX 2013 in London
Check out highlights from this year's Idea Exchange at the London Film Museum, shot by designer, photographer and master storyteller Mike Kus.

entries.title: iEX 2013 brought together creative legends like James Cameron for a day devoted...
entries.content: iEX 2013 brought together creative legends like James Cameron for a day devoted to the future of storytelling. Check back for a full album of the day's events!

entries.content: Like the portraits of our iEX 2013 keynote speakers taken by photographer and graphic designer Mike Kus?

entries.content: Our team is at the London Film Museum getting ready for iEX 2013. Get a sneak peek and stay tuned for more updates!

entries.title: One more day till James Cameron takes the stage at iEX 2013! My favorite Cameron...
entries.content: One more day till James Cameron takes the stage at iEX 2013! My favorite Cameron film is ____.

entries.title: We're thrilled to present celebrity chef Heston Blumenthal as one of our feature...
entries.content: We're thrilled to present celebrity chef Heston Blumenthal as one of our featured storytellers at iEX 2013. Do you Like Heston's philosophy of dining as a multisensory experience?

entries.title: Did you miss our talk "Adobe Throwdown: The Movie?" Watch and listen online here...
entries.content: Did you miss our talk "Adobe Throwdown: The Movie?" Watch and listen online here: http://adobe.ly/148kpEx

entries.title: Our marketing director got to meet her idol, Malcolm Gladwell, at iEX 2012. Tell...
entries.content: Our marketing director got to meet her idol, Malcolm Gladwell, at iEX 2012. Tell us in the comments which of the iEX 2013 storytellers we've named you'd most want to meet: James Cameron, Dame Vivienne Westwood, or Steven Levitt?

entries.title: We're delighted to present Steven Levitt, co-author of Freakonomics, as one of o...
entries.content: We're delighted to present Steven Levitt, co-author of Freakonomics, as one of our featured storytellers at iEX 2013. Share if Steven's ability to find interesting stories in mountains of data inspires you.

entries.content:
At Adobe Max, we challenged designers to go head-to-head, designing flyers for fake bands in 8-minute battles. Check out the designs from our "final four."


"Battle of the Hands" Design Battle at Adobe Max
At Adobe Max, we challenged designers to go head-to-head, designing flyers for fake bands in 8-minute battles. Check out the designs from our "final four."

entries.title: Check out the winning design by James Kim from our "Battle of the Hands" design...
entries.content: Check out the winning design by James Kim from our "Battle of the Hands" design competition at Adobe Max! Check back for the full album of our "final four" later.

Target Opens Tech Innovation Center in SF
blogs.wsj.com
Target opens a technology center in San Francisco to try and capitalize on innovation coming out of Silicon Valley.

entries.title: Our team in Australia sent 20 filmmakers to Tropical North Queensland armed with...
entries.content: Our team in Australia sent 20 filmmakers to Tropical North Queensland armed with just a GoPro to capture "1 Day in Paradise." Check out the campaign, and help us pick a winner: http://bit.ly/10KgxWH

entries.title: Last year at iEX, Clay Shirky told us "It isn't just about the story you tell th...
entries.content:
Last year at iEX, Clay Shirky told us "It isn't just about the story you tell the public. It's about the story you tell yourself."

Watch his session here: http://bit.ly/12jjmQ8

entries.content: We're thrilled to present Dame Vivienne Westwood as one of our featured storytellers for iEX 2013. She'll be part of the daylong discussion about how we tell our personal stories.

entries.title: Come by the SapientNitro booth at Adobe MAX to watch our designers go head-to-he...
entries.content: Come by the SapientNitro booth at Adobe MAX to watch our designers go head-to-head in 8-minute design battles. If you're feeling creative, sign up for our Battle of the Hands design tournament tomorrow, and your skills could win you a fully-loaded MacBook Pro.

entries.title: Hope you're having a happy Cinco de Mayo! Our Chicago, LA and Miami Storyscapers...
entries.content: Hope you're having a happy Cinco de Mayo! Our Chicago, LA and Miami Storyscapers kicked off their celebrations with tamales, sombreros and piñata races!
